attributes.additional_details: DAVID CAMERON SAYS HE WANTS TO RESTORE FAMILY VALUES AND IS INTENDING TO SPEND MILLIONS ON "PROBLEM FAMILIES" WELL WHY NOT START BY KEEPING CHRISTMAS AND ALL BANK HOLIDAYS FOR FAMILIES. THIS WOULD MEAN LEGISLATION TO CLOSE BUSINESSES FOR THE TWO DAYS OF CHRISTMAS AND EASTER AND ONE DAY OVER ALL OTHER BANK HOLIDAYS. MANY HAVE TO WORK ON BOXING DAY, THIS SHOULD BE TIME TO BE WITH THEIR FAMILIES, INSTEAD OF HAVING NO CHOICE BUT TO WORK!
